issue.title: [C#][CI] Change the build version from 2.2 to 3.1 in CI
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10634](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10634). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This change is required to use gRPC and flight in net core.

The build version should change from 2.2 to 3.1.

C# language version will also be changed from 7.2 to 8.0.
